channel.title: Homepage on AMENDOKAT
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on AMENDOKAT

item.title: Digital tomb
item.description:
Dedicatória: Ao verme que primeiro roeu as frias carnes do meu cadáver dedico como saudosa lembrança estas memórias póstumas.

I like the idea of this place being some sort of tomb after I’m dead. Now, I don’t plan on dying soon, but if I do - if I change my mind or get into some freak accident - this is gonna be… Well it’s gonna be very grim to navigate through that’s for sure. I really like that thought though. It’s like entering a house you know someone’s been murdered in. A constant feeling of dread, always lurking in the air and like something’s missing. I hope this website stays up for a long time after I die. As a memorial of the person I was and a time capsule of that period. Abandoned and frozen in time. Rotting away in some corner of the internet waiting for the domain to expire, much like my own mortal remains rotting on the ground waiting for the maggots to come and feast.

item.description: Bolsonaro ouviu as três batidinhas ➚ na porta hoje. Desejo muita saúde ao atual presidiário pra poder aproveitar muito os 27 anos na papuda ❤️

item.title: Links
item.description:
friendz and other cool peeps

Self explanatory.

  • The Cozy Glow Meme Account ➚ The hardest Cozy Glow memes on the web for your enjoyment. DAILY POSTS!!! Ran by my CBF(COZY BEST FRIEND!!!)
  • BigMacDavis ➚ I really like this guy’s DOOM and Duke Nukem walkthroughs, he explains stuff really well and he has a nice voice. They’re great background noise for drawing. His Doom II (100%) Walkthrough ➚ and Duke Nukem 3D (100%) Walkthrough ➚
  • DWK ➚ Brony who makes drunk recaps of MLP episodes. He abandoned the channel after quitting alcoholism, but most of the videos are still available to watch. My favorite videos are (predictable): Totally Legit Recap: “School Raze” (Part 1) MLP Season 8 Episode 25 - DWK ➚ and Totally Legit Recap: “School Raze” (Part 2) MLP Season 8 Episode 26 - DWK ➚ (these two videos on the original channel were removed because Hasbro hates fun).
  • decino ➚ Fun and educational DOOM videos.
  • Chad Chad ➚ One of the very few YT comedy channels I actually enjoy. Go check her out!
  • Mental Outlaw ➚ I don’t particularly agree with some of the stuff this guy has to say, specially the whole AI bs, but I find that his videos on the dark web and opsec in general are actually very well informed and he’s really good at explaining stuff so anyone can understand it. I would recommend his channel if you’re ever interested in learning about those topics.

web neeeigh-bors

Indie web neighbours with sites I like. If you wanna be added here just add my button to your site and lmk so I can link you back!

item.title: Having a Website Makes You About 20% Cooler
item.description: I had originally planned for my first blog post on this site to be an “indie web manifesto”, in the fashion of many other webmasters around here. If you don’t know, an indie web manifesto is a piece of writing that details your thoughts on the indie web movement and social media as a whole, mostly explaining why you’ve decided to create a website and why social media sUckZx so much!1! But I found, through my current draft and all the ones that came before, that this issue is infinitely more complex than it may seem at a first glance.

item.title: Site information
item.description:
About this site

This site is written in Markdown and built using the static site generator HUGO ➚. Hosted on Neocities ➚.

Designed for Firefox ➚ with Visual Studio Code ➚.

Originally built on Windows and later on the Linux Mint ➚ OS.

Open source, all code and assets are available on the Github repository ➚. This website and all it’s contents, except for my artwork which follows my own Terms of Service ➚, are licensed under the GNU GPL license v3 ➚. In short: Everyone is permitted to copy and distribute verbatim copies of it, but changing it is not allowed. If you change it, it must: Have a clear warning that it is a modified version of the original work and must be released under the same license.

item.title: Despite Everything, I Still Love You
item.description: Cover commission for IGIBAB’s amazing story Despite Everything, I Still Love You ➚

item.title: About me
item.description:
Who’s the webmaster?

My name is Arthur, but online I go by Kat (he/him). I’m an artist, I mostly work with digital art, fan works but I have plans for OC content in the future. I’ve done a lot of MLP fan art in the past, specifically for the little pony pegasus Cozy Glow. I’m autistic and My Little Pony has been my special interest for years now, and I don’t see that changing any time soon. I’ve had a number of hyperfixations in the past ranging from Azula from Avatar the Last Airbender, The Phantom of the Opera, The Wizard of Oz, Amity Blight from The Owl House and True Crime. Please talk to me about any of them. Besides for my drawings, I haven’t really published anything, though I’ve written a few stories and coded a few things (mainly this website and all it’s drafts) - I would really like to invest more time in those in the future, but don’t have any concrete plans to do so as of now.

item.title: Discord and The Statue.
item.description: I remember there was so much buzz around this piece when I posted it on X. A mutual I had made Chrysalis’s horn out of clay and some guy even made a comic dub! It’s the first time anything like this ever happened to me. Gosh I wish I could track that comic dub down… I don’t have it saved anymore :(

item.title: G5 COMIC SPOILERS DON'T LOOK
item.description: Hoax G5 comic I made for my AU. Some people actually fell for it at the time lol. Unfortunately most of those comments are now lost as they happened on my defunct X account, but the ones from Tumblr are still accessible if you wanna check it out. I remember a comment I got about how they thought it was “pony shigaraki”.
